comment.author: 43805217@N00
comment._content: The side picture of this guy reminds me of some Chicago gangster of the 30's, one of Al Capone's associates perhaps.

comment.author: 10203888@N00
comment._content: I suspect that's what he's trying to look like. Wonder who he nicked the flash hat from? It certainly doesn't go with the "no tie, no collar" look.

comment.author: 57892642@N00
comment._content: It's likely that the hat was provided by the Police in order to have a mugshot with the hat for recognition purposes.
